title: Why doesn\'t Wilmington maintain their medians.  Many of them look like overgrown vacant lots. Even ones in very prominent spots have chest high weeds and grass.  Who is responsible for maintaining them?
text:
Depending on where they are located, the city or the NCDOT. Most that
we know of are mowed and maintained, but not on a regular basis.
Contact City Hall about this complaint, and with others doing this as
well, action may be taken.
